channel.title: Posts on skyfish's island

item.title: First Github Page With Hugo
item.description: This is my first post in GitHub Page. I had my first attempt in just following GitHub Pages guide and it led me to Jekyll, which GitHub Pages is deeply integrated with. I came across with other coder’s blog hosted in GitHub Page and found that it is deployed via Hugo! I am considered new to GitHub Page, Jekyll and Hugo and I couldn’t resist to try it out now.
